privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introText: Welcome to {appName}. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your data when using our invoice management system and what rights you have regarding your data.
privacyPolicy.dataWeCollectText: We collect and process only the data necessary to provide our invoice management service. This includes:

dataWeCollectItems.title: Account Data
dataWeCollectItems.description: Email address and password for authentication.

dataWeCollectItems.title: Business Information
dataWeCollectItems.description: Your business details used in invoices (company name, address, contact information).

dataWeCollectItems.title: Client Data
dataWeCollectItems.description: Information about your clients necessary for invoice creation (company names, addresses, contact details).

dataWeCollectItems.title: Invoice Data
dataWeCollectItems.description: Information contained in your invoices (items, prices, payment terms, notes).

dataWeCollectItems.title: Usage Data
dataWeCollectItems.description: Basic information about how you use the application to improve our service.

privacyPolicy.howWeUseDataText: We use your data exclusively for:
howWeUseDataItems: Ensuring the security of your account
privacyPolicy.dataStorageText: All data is stored securely in our database. We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, or deletion. Your invoices and business information are only accessible through your authenticated account.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We retain your data for as long as you maintain an active account. Invoice data is kept to maintain your invoice history and comply with legal requirements regarding business documentation. You can request the deletion of your account and associated data at any time.
yourRightsItems: Delete your account and associated data
Request information about how your data is processed
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at:

termsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityText: {appName} is provided "as is" without any warranties. We are not responsible for:

termsOfService.terminationText: You may stop using the service at any time. We may terminate or suspend your access if you violate these terms or use the service inappropriately.
